title: 형용사/분사 도치 활용
description: So ~ that 구조나 분사구문 도치를 다른 문장과 연결해 말해봅니다.
examples: So moved was he by the speech that he donated $1000 on the spot, surprising everyone.
Exhausted though they were, they continued working through the night.
Gone are the days when we could travel freely without any restrictions.
learning_points: 형용사와 분사 도치를 통한 문어체 강조 표현 마스터

sentences.kr: 연설에 너무 감동받아서 그는 즉석에서 1000달러를 기부했고, 모두를 놀라게 했다.
sentences.en: So moved was he by the speech that he donated $1000 on the spot, surprising everyone.
Exhausted though they were, they continued working through the night.

sentences.kr: 어떤 제약도 없이 자유롭게 여행할 수 있던 시절은 지났다.
sentences.en: Gone are the days when we could travel freely without any restrictions.

sentences.kr: 그 결과에 너무 실망해서 그녀는 프로젝트를 완전히 포기했다.
sentences.en: So disappointed was she with the results that she abandoned the project entirely.

sentences.kr: 준비가 부족했지만, 그들은 훌륭한 성과를 거두었다.
sentences.en: Unprepared though they were, they achieved excellent results.

sentences.kr: 단순한 아이디어를 복잡하게 만드는 시대는 사라졌다.
sentences.en: Gone are the times when simple ideas were made unnecessarily complex.

sentences.kr: 그 제안이 너무 매력적이어서 그들은 즉시 동의했다.
sentences.en: So attractive was the proposal that they agreed immediately.
Challenging though the situation was, we achieved our objectives.
